group_1.narration: Iroha convinced me to give@myself one final chance.
One last chance to prove my wish isn't@responsible for my friends' deaths.
That's why I need to face this one more time.

group_1.textCenter: (It's been a year since I looked at this@box...)
(This box holds everything I have left of@them.)
(I still havenâ€™t opened it since that day...)
(I wonder why I can't bring myself to open@it...)

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Oh, Iroha.

group_1.textRight: Are you okay? You looked lost in thought.

group_1.textLeft: Just some things Kanae and Mel left behind.
Yes.
I got it out in the hope that I could finally@put my feelings in order.
But now that it's in front of me, I can't@bring myself to open it.

group_1.textRight: Is there anything I can do to help?

group_1.textLeft: Ha ha, no, it's all right.
I have to work through my feelings, there's@nothing you can do.
Oh right, we were talking about going to go@to the Coordinator today.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it's almost time to go.

group_1.textLeft: In that case, shall we head out?

group_1.textRight: Sure, but what about the box?

group_1.textLeft: I don't have to open it now.
I can deal with it later.
Oh my god!
Grief Seeds, Gems, and all these other@things...
I know this is a special situation...
But I'm not sure it's right to take all of@this.

group_1.textRight: We'll need as much power as possible in@order to help Tsuruno.
Besides, there's still so much we don't know@about the Wings of the Magius...

group_1.textLeft: I see...
Throwing everything you have away so you@can save your friend...
That's very admirable.
Your Coordinator will do her best, too.
Though I am a little worried about you,@Yachiyo.
Those keepsakes from your old teammates@that you mentioned...
Wouldn't it be wise to deal with that before@you move forward?

group_1.textRight: Mind keeping your nose out of other@people's business?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, sorry...
It's just, it's better if your mind is at@ease when we do this.
Plus, in general it's good practice to@settle the past before you move on.
You understand that, right?

group_1.textRight: But it's none of your business.

group_1.textLeft: Honestly! You don't have to be so scared.

group_1.textRight: Scared? I'm not scared of anything.

group_1.textLeft: Well, if that's what you have to say on the@matter, I'll take you at your word.
In any case...
I'll take care of both of you at the same@time today.
I don't usually do it, but I'll make an @exception this time.
